metadata.title: CVE-2019-13626 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) 2.x through 2.0.9 has a heap-based bufferover-read in Fill_IMA_ADPCM_block, caused by an integer overflow inIMA_ADPCM_decode() in audio/SDL_wave.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13626` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsdl2-2.0-0 - 2.0.10+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
libsdl2-tests - 2.0.10+dfsg1-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsdl2 package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.10+dfsg1-1ubuntu1').
